content: and repeat until your detail reaches the desired width make the embroiderystitches fairly tight guide the thread to the sides of your first stitch otherwise the stitches may start to pile up on each other you re good to go lleett slip_stitch ssttaarrtt wwiitthh tthhee nnoossee the nose will be 1 pt tall and 2 pts wide worked with diagonal stitches use the center tooth as a reference and count 2 pts up - this will be the starting point for the nose with black yarn make diagonal stitches going 1 pt down and away in either direction when the nose reaches the desired width cut the yarn and tie the ends on the inside ttiimmee ttoo ppuutt tthhee eeyyeess the eyes will be 3 pts tall and 8 pts apart from the bottom points of your nose count 3 pts away in either direction - these will be the starting points for the eyes with black yarn make vertical stitches going up 3 pts when the eyes reach the desired width cut the yarn and tie the ends on the inside ffiiiinniisshh ooffff wwiitthh tthhee cchheeeekkss the cheeks will be 2 pts long 1 row down from the eyes use the point right below the eyes as your starting point with pink yarn make horizontal stitches going 2 pts away in either direction when the cheeks reach the desired width cut the yarn and tie the ends on the inside 💀✨ jump to the next page to finish your skull aallmmoosstt tthheerree ⇢ in r 15 when you reach a tooth work your single_crochet on the back loop in the stitches in between grab both loops again to work your single_crochet r 15 - 2 single_crochet decrease x 4 8 single_crochet 2 single_crochet decrease x 4 32 r 16 - 2 single_crochet decrease x 8 24 r 17 - 1 single_crochet decrease x 8 16 ⇢ now stuff your skull firmly pack the stuffing tight around the cheeks to reveal their shape r 18 - decrease x 8 8 ⇢ cut the yarn leaving a long tail for closing close off your skull then hide the tail inside the piece d o d n n e a tag m e @ cum ita it
